text:
Although the P4Label task takes a user attribute it does not add it to the
label. This means that users can neither edit nor delete labels created by ant. 

There is a description of this problem here, on the perforce mailing list:

http://maillist.perforce.com/pipermail/perforce-user/2006-December/020423.html

Someone called Greg Pan (greg.pan at excapsa.ca) has created a patch but not
submitted it. I will submit this on his behalf.

Miles
creator: miles.daffin@morganstanley.com

text:
Perforce Ant tasks have been removed in Ant 1.9.0.
Users of Perforce Ant Tasks are advised to use the tasks supplied by Perforce Inc.
creator: antoine@apache.org
